New Records: Sri Lanka scored 162 runs in 20 overs, their highest total in the series.
West Indies were dismissed for 89 runs in 16.1 overs, their lowest score in the series.
Key Match Events: Sri Lanka won the match by 73 runs, their highest margin in the series.
Wanindu Hasaranga contributed with 5 not out and 2 wickets, a key performance in the middle order.
Pathum Nissanka scored 54 runs, the highest individual score for Sri Lanka in the match.
Pre-Game Insights: Sri Lanka elected to bat first in the match.
Post-Match Reflections: Sri Lanka's coach praised the team's effort and the performance of key players.
Pathum Nissanka was named Player of the Match for his 54-run innings.
West Indies' batting struggled, with only 89 runs in their innings.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Rangiri Dambulla International Stadium.
The scorecard was available on Sportskeeda's live updates.
